【考法 1】 n. 夸张的演讲： a figure of speech in which exaggeration is used for emphasis or effect
【例】 The debate was carried on with increasing hyperbole.
【近】 coloring, embellishment, embroidering, exaggeration, magnification, overstatement
【反】 understatement 有节制的陈述
【记】 hyper高 + ball 周星驰电影少林足球里飞得巨高的球→夸张；hyper高 + bole 发音象:抛
【另】 hyperbolic 抛物线
